Posts.Content: still-kickin wrote: Well I went today and got the always fun PET scan. Now I get to wait til Thursday when I go see my Onchologist to see how it went. I don't know which I dislike the most the actual scan or the waiting til my doc tells me if its good or not. I hope everyone is doing good today. Would it be too much to hope that everyone had a GOOD day today and a better one tomorrow, cos Every Day is a Blessing and Every Year is a Miracle. We might not have it all together, but, together we have it all Dx 4/8/2008, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IV, Grade 3, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
